hero.title: ONLINE FIELD BOOKING
hero.subtitle: CONNECT WITH FOUR DIRECTIONS
hero.description: Discover Vietnam's leading smart football field booking system. With advanced AI technology, user-friendly interface, and secure payment systems, we deliver fast, convenient, and reliable field booking experiences. Let us help you enjoy amazing sports moments with friends and family.
hero.futuristicDescription: Find a course, book a schedule, connect with the sports community - All in one modern platform

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: We are committed to bringing you the best field booking experience
features.futuristicSubtitle: Discover breakthrough features that will change the way you play sports

aiCoach.title: AI COACH
aiCoach.description: AI trainer analyzes real-time movement, provides personalized advice to improve skills

vrTraining.title: VR TRAINING
vrTraining.description: Train in virtual environment with AI opponents, perfectly simulate real situations

cryptoRewards.title: CRYPTO REWARDS
cryptoRewards.description: Earn VIC tokens when playing, participating in tournaments. Use to buy NFTs, book premium courts and more

locations.title: Diverse locations
locations.description: Over 50 high-quality football fields in Ho Chi Minh City

availability.title: 24/7 operation
availability.description: Book fields anytime, anywhere with automated system

support.title: Dedicated support
support.description: Professional support team, ready to serve

community.title: TOURNAMENTS HUB
community.subtitle: Connect with global sports community in metaverse

footer.description: Vietnam's first smart sports platform, combining AI, VR and Blockchain to create a completely new sports experience.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Discover unique features of the smart field booking system

register.register_text: Please fill in the details to sign up.
register.message_phone2: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number!
register.message_password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters!
register.message_password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter!
register.message_password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter!
register.message_password_number: Password must contain at least one number!
register.message_password_special: Password must contain at least one special character (@$!%*?&)!

login.login_text: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
login.error_account_not_verified: Account not verified. Please check your email for verification link
login.error_account_locked: Account is locked. Please contact support
login.error_too_many_attempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later
login.error_network: Network error. Please check your connection
login.error_server: Server error. Please try again later
login.error_unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
login.resend_instruction: If you didn't receive the email, click 'Resend Verification Email' to send it again.
login.resend_success: Verification email sent successfully! Please check your inbox.

verify_email.success_subtitle: Your email has been verified. You will be redirected shortly.
verify_email.success_message: Email verified successfully! You are now logged in.

forgot_password.title: FORGOT PASSWORD?
forgot_password.subtitle: Don't worry! It happens. Please enter the email address associated with your account.
forgot_password.success_message: We've sent a password reset link to {email}. Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.
forgot_password.email_note_text: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder or try again.

reset_password.title: Reset Your Password
reset_password.subtitle: Enter your new password below to complete the reset process.
reset_password.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters!
reset_password.password_pattern: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character!
reset_password.password_mismatch: The two passwords do not match!
reset_password.success_message: Your password has been reset successfully. You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds.
